body_html:
Today I tried again with the newly updated code, and the error messages changed a little: no segmentation fault but illegal instruction.

WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in CPU only mode.
Illegal instruction (core dumped)

@LeonBP The libcaffe2_detectron_ops_gpu.so lies in the <pytorch_repo_dir>/build/lib directory in my computer. The same directory also contains the following *.so files (as well as some *.a files):

libc10.so
libcaffe2_detectron_ops_gpu.so
libcaffe2_gpu.so
libcaffe2_observers.so
libcaffe2.so
libonnxifi_dummy.so
libonnxifi.so

body:
Today I tried again with the newly updated code, and the error messages changed a little: no segmentation fault but illegal instruction.
```
WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in CPU only mode.
Illegal instruction (core dumped)
```

@LeonBP The `libcaffe2_detectron_ops_gpu.so` lies in the `<pytorch_repo_dir>/build/lib` directory in my computer. The same directory also contains the following *.so files (as well as some *.a files):
```
libc10.so
libcaffe2_detectron_ops_gpu.so
libcaffe2_gpu.so
libcaffe2_observers.so
libcaffe2.so
libonnxifi_dummy.so
libonnxifi.so
```
